trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />
trans-unit.target: Especifica a aparência de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> propriedade para especificar as configurações, como cor, largura, transparência e a forma da dica de caneta para um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> propriedade para especificar os atributos de desenho para os traços adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: Somente os traçados que são adicionados após o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> sofrer alteração mostrar os atributos atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: A aparência dos traços que já estão no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> não é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> de classe, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> construtor.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar duas <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos para simular usando uma caneta e um marca-texto no mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> called `root`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o elemento raiz no arquivo XAML é uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> chamado `root`.

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `switchHighlighter` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Também supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> chamado `switchHighlighter` e que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> evento está conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> classe.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: Black
trans-unit.target: Preto

trans-unit.source: 2 device independent pixels (DIP)
trans-unit.target: 2 pixels independentes de dispositivo (DIP)

trans-unit.source: 2 DIP
trans-unit.target: DIP 2

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> a ser associado à propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada.

trans-unit.source: <c>propertyData</c> must be of type <see cref="T:System.Char" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, <see cref="T:System.Single" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, <see cref="T:System.String" />, <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>propertyData</c> deve ser do tipo <see cref="T:System.Char" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, <see cref="T:System.Single" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, <see cref="T:System.String" />, <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> ou uma matriz desses tipos de dados, no entanto, ele não pode se ruma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma propriedade personalizada ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AddPropertyData%2A> method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AddPropertyData%2A> método permite adicionar propriedades personalizadas para um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você renderizar seus próprios traços e fornecer informações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar e recuperar uma propriedade personalizada a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma propriedade que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto for uma caneta ou um marca-texto.

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> that use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object, `inkDA`.
trans-unit.target: O código de `ChangeColors_Click` manipulador processa uma nova cor de bordas no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> que usam o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto, `inkDA`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`, e que há dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos nomeados `inkDA`, e `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyData" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> é um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyData" /> is not one of the allowed data types listed in the <see langword="Parameters" /> section.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyData" /> não é um dos tipos de dados permitidos listados na seção <see langword="Parameters" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma propriedade no objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir trata o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object called `inkDA` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto chamado `inkDA` e que o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> evento está conectado ao manipulador de eventos definido neste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Copia o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Clone%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object and populates it with the same values as the current object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Clone%2A> método cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> do objeto e o preenche com os mesmos valores que o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Any custom properties are also copied.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer propriedades personalizadas também são copiadas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como copiar um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: A cor de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object .
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> a ser localizado no objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified property data identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o identificador de dados da propriedade especificado está no objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified property data identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o identificador de dados da propriedade especificado estiver no objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar e recuperar uma propriedade personalizada a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma propriedade que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto for uma caneta ou um marca-texto.

trans-unit.source: The `ChangeColors_Click` event handler changes all the strokes that were put on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> called `inkDA` to a new color.
trans-unit.target: O `ChangeColors_Click` manipulador de eventos altera os traços que foram colocados no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> com um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> chamado `inkDA` para uma nova cor.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`, e que há dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos nomeados `inkDA`, e `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> a ser comparado com o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> especificado é igual ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos são iguais se as propriedades a seguir são iguais:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A> método não verifica se as propriedades personalizadas de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir compara dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedades `attributes1` e `attributes2` são definidos como os mesmos valores, será exibida a mensagem "O DrawingAttributes são igual".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Bezier smoothing is used to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a suavização de Bezier é usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use Bezier smoothing to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para usar Bézier suavização para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to get.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associado à propriedade personalizada a ser obtida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> method to access custom properties you added to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> método para acessar as propriedades personalizadas adicionadas a um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> returns the default value for the built-in property if a value has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> Retorna o valor padrão para a propriedade interna, se um valor não foi definido.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar e recuperar uma propriedade personalizada a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma propriedade que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto for uma caneta ou um marca-texto.

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> that use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object, `inkDA`.
trans-unit.target: O código de `ChangeColors_Click` manipulador processa uma nova cor de bordas no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> que usam o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto, `inkDA`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`, e que há dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos nomeados `inkDA`, e `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is not associated with a custom property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> não está associado a uma propriedade personalizada do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os GUIDs de todas as propriedades personalizadas associadas a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the property data identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que representa os identificadores de dados da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The GUIDs for the built-in properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class are in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> class.
trans-unit.target: Os GUIDs para as propriedades internas do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> classe estão no <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the property data identifiers from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como obter os identificadores de dados de propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> called `inkDA` has been declared.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> chamado `inkDA` foi declarado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura da caneta usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor que indica a altura da caneta usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes fatores afetam a altura e largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> quando ele for renderizado, mas não o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de pressão aplicada para a caneta quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade para 0 pixels independentes de dispositivo (DIP), ele é alterado para 2 DIP.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> é menor que <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a espessura de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> renderizado muda de acordo com a quantidade de pressão aplicada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a espessura do traço é uniforme; <see langword="false" /> para indicar que a espessura de um renderizado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> aumenta quando pressão é aumentada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> é semelhante a um marca-texto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> as a highlighter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> como um marca-texto; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> está definida como `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> é ligeiramente transparente, que permite que os traços sob apareça.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o maior valor permitido para a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxHeight> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxHeight> campo para verificar se um valor está dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Faça isso quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, como a entrada do usuário sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o maior valor permitido para a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxWidth> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxWidth> campo para verificar se um valor está dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Faça isso quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, como a entrada do usuário sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o menor valor permitido para a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinHeight> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinHeight> campo para verificar se um valor está dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Faça isso quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, como a entrada do usuário sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o menor valor permitido para a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinWidth> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinWidth> campo para verificar se um valor está dentro dos limites permitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: Faça isso quando o valor é proveniente de uma fonte desconhecida, como a entrada do usuário sem restrição.

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir garante o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> é definido como um valor válido.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que haja uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, chame o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> método para a classe base garantir que representantes registrados recebam o evento.

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando qualquer propriedade <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> é alterada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class to ensure registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, chame o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> método para a classe base garantir que representantes registrados recebam o evento.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> especificados são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos são iguais se as propriedades a seguir são iguais:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Equality%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Equality%2A> método não verifica se as propriedades personalizadas de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir compara dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos para igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedades `attributes1` e `attributes2` são definidos como os mesmos valores, será exibida a mensagem "O DrawingAttributes são igual".

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> especificados não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos não forem iguais; do contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal:
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos não são iguais se as propriedades a seguir não são iguais:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Inequality%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Inequality%2A> método não verifica se as propriedades personalizadas de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é a negação de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir compara dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedades `attributes1` e `attributes2` são definidos como os mesmos valores, será exibida a mensagem "O DrawingAttributes são igual".

trans-unit.source: Occurs when property data is added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os dados da propriedade são adicionados ou removidos da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a custom stroke that can draw a three-dimensional effect.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de um traço personalizado que se conectam a um efeito tridimensional.

trans-unit.source: The stroke defines and stores a custom property called `Shadowed`, which belongs to <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O traço define e armazena uma propriedade personalizada chamada `Shadowed`, que pertence à <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the `Shadowed` property changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged> event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> method, which causes the stroke to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `Shadowed` alterações de propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged> chamadas de manipulador de eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> método, o que faz com que o traço seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associado à propriedade personalizada a ser removida.

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove a propriedade personalizada associada ao <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to remove a custom property from a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como remover uma propriedade personalizada de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is not associated with a custom property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> não está associado a uma propriedade personalizada do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a forma da caneta usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> que especifica a transformação a ser executada na ponta da caneta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> que especifica a transformação para executar na dica a caneta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> propriedade girar, distorcer ou dimensionar a dica de caneta.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: A matriz definida como <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> não é uma matriz que pode ser invertida.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY" /> property of the matrix is not zero.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY" /> da matriz não é zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da caneta usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: A largura da caneta usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes fatores afetam a altura e largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> quando ele for renderizado, mas não o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de pressão aplicada para a caneta quando o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade para 0 pixels independentes de dispositivo (DIP), ele é alterado para 2 DIP.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é usada normalmente em XAML.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como definir a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que o aplicativo tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chamado `inkCanvas1`e dois <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objetos chamados `inkDA` e `highlighterDA`.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> property is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> é menor que <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
